name: you&me
description:
you&me is a Yume Nikki fangame , and is the titular game of the you&me series, created in RPG Maker 2003. This game focuses on the connection and mechanics of the dreams, both shared and not shared, between Yarn and Nyla, and how these two sisters influence one-another.

This game was created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam, in celebration of Yume Nikki's 13th anniversary. This is a game that follows a similar structure to Yume Nikki, as you explore through dreams and collect Stuff, but is otherwise a self-contained, original project.

This game is very unfinished, and just barely held together. At this moment, there is a bedroom made, ten unfinished maps to explore, and four Stuff to collect. There is no menu option in this game at the moment- All Stuff requires the Number keys.

This is a prototype- a very early build of the game, to serve as a proof-of-concept, and will be updated to a more polished version sometime in 2018 (I hope). Thank you for your interest, and I hope to be able to deliver a higher quality product soon.

Controls:

  • Movement - Arrow Keys, HJKL
  • Action - Z, Enter, Spacebar
  • Nap - Shift (wait several seconds to enter the dream)
  • Stuff - Numbers 1234 (while dreaming)
  • Wake Up - Number 0
